orderId.description: Unique identifier for the WooCommerce order.

newStatus.description: The new status to assign to the order.

phone.description: Contact phone number of the customer.

itemsCount.description: Total number of items in the order.

totalAmount.description: Total amount for the order, including taxes and shipping.

currency.description: Currency code for the order (e.g., USD, EUR).

statusChangeReason.description: Reason for the status change, if applicable.

sendEmailToCustomer.description: Indicates if an email notification should be sent to the customer about the status update.

notifyAdmin.description: Indicates if the admin should be notified about the status change.

customerEmail.description: Content of the email to send to the customer.

adminEmail.description: Content of the email to send to the admin.
